txt.en: 'Have you come across any of our pigs, traveller? I have food for them, but they seem more interested in wandering around Glaniath instead!\n\n'I can't afford to keep waiting -- I'm going to start looking for them. If you don't mind helping out, here's some food to feed those stubborn beasts!'
It's meal time for the pigs of Glaniath.

'Hmph, these pigs made me work just to feed them! They'll likely start expecting me to come to them with food, too. I've got to find another way -- when I have less work to do, perhaps.\n\n'Thank you for your aid, traveller.'
You have fed all the pigs you could find around Glaniath.\n\nYou should talk to Mileth.
Mileth has asked you to help her feed the pigs wandering around Glaniath.
